text: @BorisJohnson Why are we deliberately inflating the death rate of covid19? Why are we sending covid19 patients into care homes? Why are you still using Ferguson's dodgy 500 thousand dead algorithm as justification for this lockdown? Why is Hancock saying we all need a vaccination?
